p: The estimation covers planted acreage of barley, corn, upland cotton, rice, sorghum, soybeans, winter wheat, spring wheat, and alfalfa hay, which jointly occupy of about 96% of US cropland. The data used cover these crops in 2693 counties in 41 US states over the years 1975 to 2011. The data used in the estimation were drawn from USDA NASS Quick Stats 12. The total number of observations is 99,641.
